description: The Green Walker Farm (GWF), established in 2017, focuses on sustainable agriculture through innovative practices like Black Soldier Fly (BSF) farming. GWF produces plantain, banana, poultry, and animal feeds while aiming to enhance productivity and mechanize operations. Collaborating with experts and institutions, the farm addresses food system challenges by reducing competition for resources like soy and fish meal, promoting environmental sustainability and economic growth in the community.
name: Green Walker Farm
